about_the_game:
Carefully selected tracks capture the rhythm of farming and the warmth of village life, serving as a comforting companion in the development of your domain. The music synchronizes with the changing seasons, from the hope of sowing to the joy of reaping, inspiring you and your villagers to work together to cultivate prosperity. As the village grows, the hustle of trade and the vibrancy of the marketplace come to life in the melodies, showcasing the prosperity.

The OST of "Tribal Survivors" accompanies every step of your journey, chronicling the transformation of your village from desolation to prosperity.
